title: Working part time in a restaraunt

content.question:
You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

You will have a conversation with Wang Min, the manager of a Chinese restaurant, about a part-time job waiting on tables.

Press record to begin each response to the conversation.

Response 1

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity
